column2: Millions more may be preparing to follow them to the exits – one survey found that around a third of workers wanted to make a career change. In general, workers who quit are not eligible for unemployment insurance. Instead, unemployment insurance is reserved for those who lost their job through no fault of their own, generally as a result of a layoff or other termination.
column4: The ‘Great Resignation’: Heed these 8 tips from an employment lawyer before you quit
